channel.title: [718/742] Athens - "Knowledge. Wisdom. Prosperity." - Rest in peace!
channel.description:
Dear Athens players, Thank you so much for enjoying Athens, Arham & I's baby. We were so excited to see people enjoying the content we created, having fun in the Skype chat, and overall providing a fun experience for everyone playing Athens. We wish this fun could go on forever, and we would never have to come to this option. But sadly, as all things do, it must come to an end. This isn't something Arham & I would like, or ever announce, especially with any of our projects, but it seems we had some trouble getting off the ground especially in the financial department. With that, we can no longer afford to keep Athens alive, and Arham especially has actually lost money on Athens and we have zero funds to continuously support the website and server costs. With this, Arham is attempting to recover the lost with becoming a paid developer over at Rune-Blaze and I am following becoming an administrator. We're looking at this as a 'merger', hoping our players move over to play Rune-Blaze and even your donations meaning something over there. Alan, the Rune-Blaze owner, has said he would attempt to recover the amount donated to Athens with something equivalent at Rune-Blaze. We thank you for playing, and hope to see you over at Rune-Blaze. Andrew Athens Community Manager & All of Athens's Staff
[spoiler=Thread] [center][img]http://puu.sh/9Ufwi/0139291d99.png[/img][img]http://puu.sh/9Ugwr/df6ad7c0f7.png[/img][img]http://puu.sh/9Ugx8/3d5ddccb43.png[/img][img]http://puu.sh/9UgxT/fa7ded548c.png[/img][img]http://puu.sh/9UgyB/084eb1b67b.png[/img][img]http://puu.sh/9Ugze/3f40057c69.png[/img] [url=http://www.theathens.net/][img]http://i.imgur.com/3z9C4De.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.theathens.net/forums/][img]http://i.imgur.com/oVbCCRg.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.theathens.net/available/Athens.jar][img]http://i.imgur.com/lNTi95Z.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.theathens.net/vote/][img]http://i.imgur.com/P9Bmdyx.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.theathens.net/store/][img]http://i.imgur.com/K466oaX.png[/img][/url] [img]http://i.imgur.com/iXZv2if.png[/img] [img]http://s3.postimg.org/ggel6jttf/athenslayout4.gif[/img] [img]http://s3.postimg.org/wmaxt6z03/athenslayout2.gif[/img] [img]http://s3.postimg.org/n5l4mkf5f/athenslayout5.gif[/img] [img]http://s3.postimg.org/i5noem9ir/athenslayout3.gif[/img] [img]http://s3.postimg.org/kygvyn9v7/athenslayout6.gif[/img] [size=18pt][b]Development Log[/b][/size] [b]Latest update: Athens now has Ganodermic Beasts![/b] [code] On August 2nd, 2014, Athens featured Ganodermic Beasts in the manhole near the Gypsy! On August 1st, 2014, Athens features Pest Control! On August 1st, 2014, Athens featured Summoning! On July 31st, Athens featured a custom minigame, The Hunger Games Minigame! On July 31st, 2014, Athens featured Jadinkos. On July 31st, 2014, Athens added the Gnome Glider transportation system. On July 31st, 2014, Athens featured Ice strykewyrms. On July 29th, 2014, Nomad was added for Lords-only. On July 23rd, 2014, the Abyss was added! On July 22nd, 2014, Dungeoneering - Horde mode was added. On July 22nd, 2014, Puro Puro was added. On July 22nd 2014, the longbow sight worked. On July 22nd, 2014, the scroll of cleansing worked. On July 22nd, 2014, the coal bag worked. On July 22nd, 2014, the twisted bird necklace worked. On July 21st, 2014, the gem bag worked. On July 21st, 2014, the bonecrusher worked. On July 21st, 2014, resource dungeons were added. On July 21st, 2014, Athens had a notes system. On July 21st, 2014, jewelry stringing was added. On July 21st, 2014, jewelry smithing was fixed. On July 20th, 2014, Lords got custom teleport animations for home teleport. On July 19th, 2014, bolt enchanting was added. On July 10th, 2014, you could make spirit shields. On July 10th, 2014, you could smith dragonfire shields. On July 9th, 2014, skillcape teleporting was added. On July 9th, 2014, you could melt armour! On July 7th, 2014, more thieving stalls were added to the Thieving area. On July 7th, 2014, the Herblore dungeon was added. On July 6th, 2014, the bury-all option was added to bones. On June 28th, 2014, the Hunter skill was added to Athens. On June 26th, 2014, Server-Forums Integration was put into Athens. On June 23rd, 2014, a lottery system was added to Athens. On June 23rd, 2014, auto-voting was added to Athens. On June 19th, 2014, Athens featured on-spot dueling! On June 18th, 2014, the XP well was added to Athens. On June 17th, 2014, you could duel anywhere. On June 6th, 2014, Athens was a 742 On June 3rd, 2014, skilling interfaces were fixed. On June 3rd, 2014, flax was now accessible via Varrock. On June 3rd, 2014, Athens featured the Dwarf multicannon, along with the Royal and Gold cannons. On June 2nd, 2014, Athens featured notifications when a private message is received. On June 1st, 2014, Athens featured the Spirit Tree. On June 1st, 2014, Athens featured sheep shearing. On June 1st, 2014, Athens featured the rare drop table. On June 1st, 2014, Athens' following was fixed. No longer would players be stuck behind trees forever. On May 28th, 2014, Athens had Bones on Altar added. On May 27th, 2014, Athens had added 2 coal, 2 silver, and 2 mithril ore to the east mine and 2 admantite and 1 runite ore to the west mine of Varrock. On May 27th, 2014, a Thieving place was added at the South-East of Varrock. On May 27th, 2014, the Forinthry Dungeon was added. On May 26th, 2014, Athens had begun. [/code] [b]Total updates: 51[/b] [hr] [url=http://www.theathens.net/][img]http://i.imgur.com/9TWukeZ.gif[/img][/url][/center][/spoiler]

@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:49, topic:544661”]Rest in peace Athens!
http://theathens.net/[/quote]
TBH I logged on once. It was rather laggy for the 5 or 10 minutes I was on.
I logged mostly because of the lag, but also because newer servers just ain’t my deal.
Sad to see it go.

  2. Jungle Strykewyrms can now be found in the forest of Varrock.
  3. Yaks can be found in the place Rock crabs are (use fairy ring to get there).

Please note: We list NPC spawns as updates only in the thread to raise awareness, not the update log. Our update log contains only content!

item.title: [718/742] Athens - "Knowledge. Wisdom. Prosperity." - Rest in peace!
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:39, topic:544661”][quote author=Ykcud link=topic=663535.msg4434468#msg4434468 date=1404579791]
I would try it but I just want to play the game, not use the forums. Take off the requirement to register and you will get a lot more players.
[/quote][/quote]

[QUOTE AUTHOR=ox random xi]player identity is important. we want everyone to be responsible for their account, and having them accountable with the forums linked is important to us and everyone.
also, with this, the whole ‘registering for the forums’ becomes important with the forums being more used (hopefully)
I also believe players will be more enticed to stay if they took the time to register & get familiar with the game before they just ‘jump in and play’. When people don’t read the forums, or any info on there, and just ‘jump in & play’ are more likely to play for ~10 minutes and never come back.[/QUOTE]

[hr]

[size=18pt]Updates of 8/1/2014 (August 1st, 2014)[/size]

1. Summoning! More information here!
2. Pest Control!
3. Lords get sharks-only fishing spots at the Lord-only area.
4. The Lord-only training area got NPCs replaced. Instead of Lesser, greater, and black demons, they’ll find fire giants. Instead of jungle spiders and dagannoths, they’ll find 2 frost dragons.
[spoiler=Media]




[/spoiler]

Read full topic

    BUG FIX: 5. You can now make 10 bolts with one bar, instead of 1 bolt with one bar in smithing.
